bank.assignment

Class RunBank

  • java.lang.Object
    • bank.assignment.RunBank

  • public class RunBank
extends java.lang.Object
    Lab Assignment 4 This lab consists of a bank system. Users can complete transaction by themselves oer with each other, and a bank manager can also use this. This is where the running of the bank will take place
    Since:
    November 09, 2020 We confirm that the work of this assignment is completely our own. By turning in this assignment, we declare that we did not receive unauthorized assistance. Moreover, all deliverables including, but not limited to the source code, lab report and output files were written and produced by us alone.

    RunBank body taken from Grecia, refactored by Grecia

    Course: CS 3331

    Professor: Dr. Daniel Mejia

    lab assignment: Programming assignment 4

    lab description: Addition of programming assignmet 3 with password and error handling.
